matrix
Class DMat

java.lang.Object
  matrix.Mat
      matrix.DMat

public class DMat
extends Mat

Class for general dense matrix. This class uses an external library called "MTJ".

Author:
Murat Artim

DMat

public DMat(double r1,
            double r2,
            double r3,
            int order)
Creates three dimensional transformation matrix from Euler angles. The transformation is in either X-Y-Z or Z-Y-X order depending on the order parameter.

Parameters:
r1 - Rotation about x in degrees.
r2 - X-Y-Z order -> Rotation about y' in degrees, Z-Y-X order -> Rotation about z' in degrees.
r3 - X-Y-Z order -> Rotation about z'' in degrees, Z-Y-X order -> Rotation about y'' in degrees.
order - The order of rotation, X-Y-Z or Z-Y-X.

isSymmetric

public boolean isSymmetric()
Checks if the matrix is symmetric.

Returns:
True if matrix is symmetric, false vice versa.

lump

public DMat lump()
Returns row-sum lumped matrix. The matrix should be square, symmetric and positive definite.

Returns:
Row-sum lumped matrix.

Mirrors the upper triangular part of the matrix to lower triangular part.

The new matrix.
